nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Transaction select count(*) 
facet cases(
where request.headers.host not like '%dev%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%stage%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%qa%' 
and request.headers.host like '%www%' 
and tags.Env !='Test'
and host not like '%issrv%'
and request.headers.host not like '%localhost%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%139.%' 
and request.headers.host is not null 
and request.headers.referer not like '%192.168.%'
and request.headers.referer not like 'http://www.brodjanac.com/'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%preview%'
and request.headers.host not like '%.fi.muc.%' 
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%spider%' 
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%crawler%' 
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%bot%' 
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%/13.0.5 Safari/605.1.15'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Trident%' 
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%contentking%'
and request.headers.userAgent != 'Mozilla/5.0'
and request.headers.userAgent != 'Mozilla/5.1'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Lighthouse'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/81%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/1.%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/2.%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/3%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/4%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/5%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/6%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/12.%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/80%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/83%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/86%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/87%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/88%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/86%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/89%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/91%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/98%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/99%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/100%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/2%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/3%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/4%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/5%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/6%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/86%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/15%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/92%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/91%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/98%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/99%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/75%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/70%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/102.8%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/73%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/71%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/77%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Firefox/78%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%PhantomJS%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%RKQ1.200826%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Version/13.0.3%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Version/9.0.2 Safari/601.3.9%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Mobile Safari/10600.%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%OS X 11_2_2%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%OS 14_4%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%beanserver%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%SISTRIX%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like '%Chrome/42%'
and request.headers.userAgent not like 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K)%'
and request.headers.userAgent like 'Mozilla%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like 'Opera%' 
as 'Real Prod', 
where request.headers.host not like '%dev%' 
and request.headers.host  not like '%stage%' 
and request.headers.host  not like '%qa%' 
and request.headers.host like '%www%' 
or request.headers.host is null 
or tags.Env ='Test'
or host like '%issrv%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%preview%'
or request.headers.host like '%.fi.muc.%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like '%spider%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like '%crawler%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like '%bot%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like '%/13.0.5 Safari/605.1.15'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Trident%' 
or request.headers.userAgent like '%contentking%'
or request.headers.userAgent != 'Mozilla/5.0'
or request.headers.userAgent != 'Mozilla/5.1'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Lighthouse'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/81%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/1.%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/2.%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/3%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/4%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/5%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/6%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/7%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/12.%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/80%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/83%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/86%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/87%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/88%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/86%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/89%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/91%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/98%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/99%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/100%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/2%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/3%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/4%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/5%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/6%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/86%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/15%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/92%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/98%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/99%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/75%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/70%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/102.8%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/73%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/71%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/77%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/78%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Firefox/92%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%RKQ1.200826%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%PhantomJS%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Version/13.0.3%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Version/9.0.2 Safari/601.3.9%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Mobile Safari/10600.%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%OS X 11_2_2%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%OS 14_4%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%beanserver%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%SISTRIX%'
or request.headers.userAgent like '%Chrome/42%'
or request.headers.userAgent like 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; orroid 10; K)%'
or request.headers.userAgent not like 'Mozilla%' 
or request.headers.userAgent not like 'Opera%' 
as 'Bot / PreProd') since 1 day ago
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) facet httpResponseCode, http.statusCode since 1 day ago
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) facet request.headers.userAgent limit 30  since 1 day ago

timeseries max

widgets.title: Response Errors excl. gif, png, js, css, ico, xml and path /_ui/

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) timeseries max where httpResponseCode >= '400' or http.statusCode >= 400 or http.statusCode >= '400' where request.uri not like '/_ui/%' and request.uri not like '%.png' and request.uri not like '%css' and request.uri not like '%gif' and request.uri not like '%.js' and request.uri not like '%.ico' and request.uri not like '%woff%' facet httpResponseCode, http.statusCode since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Response Errors only gif, png, js, css, ico, xml and path /_ui/

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) timeseries max where httpResponseCode >= '400'  or http.statusCode >= 400 or http.statusCode >= '400' 
 where request.uri like '/_ui/%' or request.uri like '%.png' or request.uri like '%css' or request.uri like '%woff%' or request.uri like '%gif' or request.uri like '%.js' or request.uri like '%.ico' or request.uri like '%.xml' facet httpResponseCode, http.statusCode since 1 day ago

FROM Transaction SELECT percentile(duration) since 1 day ago facet cases(
where request.headers.host not like '%dev%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%stage%'

widgets.title: Total requests gif, png, js, css, ico, xml and path /_ui/

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) where request.uri like '/_ui/%' or request.uri like '%.png' or request.uri like '%css' or request.uri like '%gif' or request.uri like '%.js' or request.uri like '%.ico' or request.uri like '%.xml' facet request.uri limit 50  since 1 day ago
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) since 1 day ago facet appName

widgets.title: Errors excl. gif, png, js, css, ico, xml and path /_ui/

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*)
 where request.uri not like '/_ui/%' and request.uri not like '%.png' and request.uri not like '%css' and request.uri not like '%woff%' and request.uri not like '%gif' and request.uri not like '%.js' and request.uri not like '%.ico' and request.uri not like '%.xml' facet request.uri limit 50 since 1 day ago
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) facet request.headers.userAgent limit 50 where request.headers.userAgent not like 'Mozilla%' since 1 day ago
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) facet request.headers.referer limit 50 since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Compute Hours serving Bots vs Real

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Transaction SELECT sum(duration)/60/60 as 'Hours' since 1 day ago facet cases(
where request.headers.host not like '%dev%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%stage%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%qa%' 
and tags.Env !='Test'
and host not like '%issrv%'
and request.headers.host not like '%localhost%' 
and request.headers.host not like '%139.%' 
and request.headers.host is not null 
and request.headers.referer not like '%192.168.%'
and request.headers.referer not like 'http://www.brodjanac.com/'
